attributes.action: Covid vaccine to be given to IT, telecom and utilities engineers
attributes.additional_details: Covid vaccine to be given to IT, telecom and utilities engineers who have to visit client sites may it be homes or offices to keep businesses running, having to have to travel and go onsite with high exposure to virus, leaving exposure to being a carrier of the virus if not getting the virus having to go into offices or homes to get service running to keep business up and running. Without engineer doing their job networks and businesses wouldn't be able to continue working.
attributes.background: Covid vaccine to be given to IT, telecom and utilities engineers who have to visit client sites may it be homes or offices to keep businesses running
